loading.description: Message to display when draw tool is loading

description_header_title.description: Title text for the header of the description input block

description_header_maximized.value: (Tipear su texto en la caja de abajo)

prompt_title.description: Title text for the prompt (instructions) link/button

autoGrade_confirm.value: Quedan {0} intento(s) para recibir ayuda sobre su respuesta, por lo tanto piensen bien antes de responder. ¿Listos para recibir ayuda sobre su respuesta?
autoGrade_confirm.description: Confirmation message to show users when they are submitting an answer for auto grading and feedback

autoGrade_result.value: El sistema de corrección automático arrojó como resultado {0} de {1}.
autoGrade_result.description: Feedback showing users the auto score resulting from their submission

autoGrade_complete.value: ¡Buen trabajo! Utilizaron todas sus posibilidades para enviarlo. Pueden continuar editando el dibujo si quieren.
autoGrade_complete.description: Confirmation message alerting users that they have used all of their auto score submissions

autoGrade_submissionComplete.description: Confirmation message to display when users submit an auto scored answer

sizeLimit_title.description: Title text for dialog alerting users that the drawing has exceeded the allowed file size

sizeLimit_warning.value: ¡Atención! El dibujo actual es muy grande.
sizeLimit_warning.description: Warning text for dialog alerting users that the drawing has exceeded the allowed file size

sizeLimit_instructions.value: Si quieren grabar este dibujo, por favor borren alguno de los objetos en esta imagen. ¡Gracias!
sizeLimit_instructions.description: Instructions text for dialog alerting users that the drawing has exceeded the allowed file size

snapshots_playback_pause.description: Title/tooltip text for the button to pause snapshot playback

snapshots_playback_speed.description: Title/tooltip text for the slider control to edit the speed at which snapshots are played back

snapshots_playback_units.description: Text for the unit measurement (per second) of the speed at which snapshots are played back

snapshots_dialog_delete_confirm.description: Confirmation text users will see when they attempt to delete a snapshot

snapshots_dialog_tooMany_title.description: Title for the dialog alerting users when they attempt to add a snapshot but have reached the maximum number allowed

snapshots_dialog_tooMany_warning.description: Warning for alerting users when they attempt to add a snapshot but have reached the maximum number allowed

snapshots_dialog_tooMany_instructions.value: Si quieren crear otro, borren alguno de los fotogramas actuales cliqueando en la 'X' en la esquina superior derecha del fotograma que quieran borrar.
